                                ActAdministrator aActAdministrator)

        Specified by:
        setActAdministrator in interface IcrashEnvironment
        Parameters:
        keyName - The key of which to store the actor by, keeps this the same as that you use the get actor method. Currently we use the login name as the key
        aActAdministrator - The actor administrator to place in the hashtable
